column2: title=''An Artist's Interpretation of Middle Earth Including the Wild Lands -  East, South & North''

column1: '''An Artist's Interpretation of Middle Earth''' is a 24" x 36" color map for ''[[Middle-earth Role Playing]]'', 1st Edition.
*Concept and design: Peter C. Fenlon and [[Terry K. Amthor]]
*Illustrations from the [[The Lord of the Rings (1978 film)
column2: Motion Picture ''The Lord of the Rings'']]

column1: Peter Fenlon also wrote a gazetteer based on the geographical names used on the map. The gazetteer was only published by [[Iron Crown Enterprises
column2: ICE]] on the internet and is now off-line.
